Package tanks

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • elements.Element
      • tanks.Tank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Element>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyTank, Player
    public abstract class Tank
extends Element
    An abstract class representing a Tank

      • Tank

        public Tank​(double x,
            double y,
            int levelSizeX,
            int levelSizeY,
            int delay,
            Level level)
        Constructs a new Tank Creates the side and top polygons
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the Tank
        y - the y position of the Tank
        levelSizeX - the x size of the Level
        levelSizeY - the y size of the Level
        delay - the delay between frames
        level - the Level that the tank is in
